str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
